UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of therapeutically improved analogue of the antimicrobial peptide, indolicidin, using a glycosylation strategy.
Literature.Author: Dwivedi R, Aggarwal P, Bhavesh NS, Kaur KJ

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rat erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=>400 µM,Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:LD50=64 µM
